name: Fidget Spinner Life
description:
Return False- You wake up a shambeled mess in a laboratory; you are a cyborg. As you try to fight your way out in a 'MetroidVania' type of manner (initial GameJam release might be a tad dry on enemies) you are met with the husks of past cyborgs that were placed in a similar situation as you. Now, the question is... Will you be able to choose your fate, or not... This game is pretty traditional, and we screwed up our time management a little bit, so some planned features may not be included. We streamed the entire gig on twitch.tv/cheapgsean... OR NOT DUNANANANASNSHAANNNN FIDGET SPINNER SIMULATOR INITIATE___ I'm sorry we'll make a damn good game from our original concept work

Bideo: here
